attributes.action: Stop being anti-gun in legal ownership and focus on illegal gun ownership and use!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hereby request that the Prime Minister and his Government become focussed on illegal gun ownership.
Stop trying to ban more guns both air powered or gunpowder powered, unless they are illegally held.
Why if legal gun ownership was so bad, did gun crime increase after certain types of legally held gun were banned (by Government falling foul of crowd hysteria)?
The focus on abhorance of guns and their owners by the Prime Minister is an act of Minority discrimination, please be sweet and publically appologise to legal, law abiding gun owning voters Mr Brown!
